title: Immigration and citizenship

Show me more... Applying for a visa Australian citizenship Entering or leaving Australia Employing or sponsoring workers I already have a visa New Zealand citizens Permanent residence (PR) Reset Employ people from overseas See how to bring someone into Australia to work for you Hamas-Israel conflict support Find visa information to support those impacted by the Hamas-Israel conflict and surrounding areas Explore visa options Answer a few questions to identify which visas might be suitable for you and your family Our online forms and services Apply, notify us of changes, check status or withdraw an application. Use ImmiAccount or VEVO. Become an Australian citizen See if you are eligible and how to apply Visa expiring or has expired See what your options are and what you need to do Your situation has changed Moved? Had a baby? Got a new passport? Need to change your plans? Find out what you need to do Visa conditions Your visa has conditions. Find out what you can and can't do Report suspicious activities Report suspicious or illegal immigration, citizenship, customs and trade activity News slider News See all 12 Dec 2025 From Backpacks to Bonds 50 years of Australia’s Working Holiday Maker Program 02 Dec 2025 Australian Immi App is now available in 34 countries Travelling to Australia is simpler with this new mobile phone app. 24 Nov 2025 Systems maintenance 28 November – 29 November 2025 We will be doing systems maintenance from 8:30 pm (AEDT) Friday 28 November 2025 to 12 noon (AEDT) Saturday 29 November 2025. End of News slider ​Contact General Do you have a question, feedback or a complaint? Let us help you find the right answer.
